name: Mind Cubes - Puzzle Platformer
description:
Challenge your mind in this dark gravity-shifting, puzzle-platformer with twist in more than 100 different levels.

You will be able to navigate the MIND CUBES bunny through the levels by running, jumping and changing the gravity which will often open up a lot of possibilities to actually solve a puzzle. Furthermore, there are hidden collectibles and traps all over the place. Teleporters, deathly chain-saws and giant carnivorous plants are just some of the many difficulties that you will need to overcome!

Features:
- More than 100 mind-bending MIND CUBES
- Even more MIND CUBES will be added over time
- Intuitive gameplay creates a smooth beginning of the game but...
- The cubes are getting crazy difficult at a later stage - can you solve them all?
- Freaking funky dark music
- Cool combination of puzzle and platformer gameplay
